de.mrapp.android.preference

Class AbstractColorPickerPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.AbstractPreference
        • de.mrapp.android.preference.DialogPreference
          • de.mrapp.android.preference.AbstractColorPickerPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnKeyListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnShowListener, java.lang.Comparable<android.preference.Preference>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorPalettePreference

    public abstract class AbstractColorPickerPreference
extends DialogPreference
    An abstract base class for all preferences, which allow to choose a color.
    Since:
    1.4.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat
      The formats, which are supported to print textual representations of colors.
      static class  AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape
      Contains all shapes, which can be used to show previews of colors.
      static class  AbstractColorPickerPreference.SavedState
      A data structure, which allows to save the internal state of an AbstractColorPickerPreference.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.preference.Preference

        android.preference.Preference.BaseSavedState, android.preference.Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener, android.preference.Preference.OnPreferenceClickListener

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractColorPickerPreference

        public AbstractColorPickerPreference(@NonNull
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new preference, which allows to choose a color.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the preference, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null

      • AbstractColorPickerPreference

        public AbstractColorPickerPreference(@NonNull
                                     android.content.Context context,
                                     @Nullable
                                     android.util.AttributeSet attributeSet)
        Creates a new preference, which allows to choose a color.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the preference, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attributes of the XML tag that is inflating the preference, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes are available

      • AbstractColorPickerPreference

        public AbstractColorPickerPreference(@NonNull
                                     android.content.Context context,
                                     @Nullable
                                     android.util.AttributeSet attributeSet,
                                     @AttrRes
                                     int defaultStyle)
        Creates a new preference, which allows to choose a color.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the preference, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attributes of the XML tag that is inflating the preference, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes are available
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this preference. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource

      • AbstractColorPickerPreference

        public AbstractColorPickerPreference(@NonNull
                                     android.content.Context context,
                                     @Nullable
                                     android.util.AttributeSet attributeSet,
                                     @AttrRes
                                     int defaultStyle,
                                     @StyleRes
                                     int defaultStyleResource)
        Creates a new preference, which allows to choose a color.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the preference, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attributes of the XML tag that is inflating the preference, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes are available
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this preference. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource
        defaultStyleResource - A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the preference, used only if the default style is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults

    • Method Detail

      • getColor

        public final int getColor()
        Returns the currently persisted color of the preference.
        Returns:
        The currently persisted color as an Integer value

      • setColor

        public final void setColor(int color)
        Sets the current color of the preference. By setting a value, it will be persisted.
        Parameters:
        color - The color, which should be set, as an Integer value

      • isPreviewShown

        public final boolean isPreviewShown()
        Returns, whether a preview of the preference's color is shown, or not.
        Returns:
        True, if a preview of the preference's color is shown, false otherwise

      • showPreview

        public final void showPreview(boolean showPreview)
        Sets, whether a preview of the preference's color should be shown, or not.
        Parameters:
        showPreview - True, if a preview of the preference's color should be shown, false otherwise

      • getPreviewSize

        public final int getPreviewSize()
        Returns the size of the preview of the preference's color.
        Returns:
        The size of the preview of the preference's color as an Integer value in pixels

      • setPreviewSize

        public final void setPreviewSize(int previewSize)
        Sets the size of the preview of the preference's color.
        Parameters:
        previewSize - The size, which should be set, as an Integer value in pixels. The size must be at least 1

      • getPreviewShape

        public final AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape getPreviewShape()
        Returns the shape of the preview of the preference's color.
        Returns:
        The shape of the preview of the preference's color as a value of the enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape. The shape may either be CIRCLE or SQUARE

      • getColorFormat

        public final AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat getColorFormat()
        Returns the format, which is used to print a textual representation of the preference's color.
        Returns:
        The format, which is used to print a textual representation of the preference's color, as a value of the enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.ColorFormat. The format may either be RGB, ARGB, HEX or AHEX
